title: raara paNisayana
sahitya:
rArA phaNishayana ravi jaladhija nayana rakA shashivadana ramaNIya apaghana

caraNam 1

 rArA bhava taraNa rArA amita suguNa rArA bhUramaNa rArA abja sucaraNa
   
caraNam 2

 rArA sukumAra rArA asama shUra rArA raghuvIra rArA yudhi dhIra
   
caraNam 3

 rArA jAnakitO rArA sahajulatO rArA pavanajutO rArA bhaktulatO
   
caraNam 4

 nAgAvana nEta rAga guNa virahita sAgara tanya yuta tyAgarAja vinuta
